analyzed: tad kṛtayā eva ṭippaṇyā sametam

original: vidvāṃso vasudhātale paravacaḥślāghāsu vācaṃyamā bhūpālāḥ kamalāvilāsamadironmīlanmadāghūrṇitāḥ /
analyzed: vidvāṃsaḥ vasudhā tale para vacaḥ ślāghāsu vācaṃyamāḥ bhūpālāḥ kamalā vilāsa madirā unmīlat mada āghūrṇitāḥ

original: āsye ghāsyati kasya lāsyamadhunā dhanyasya kāmālasasvarvāmādharamādhurīmadharayanvācāṃ vilāso mama // JPran_1 //
analyzed: āsye gha asyati kasya lāsyam adhunā dhanyasya kāma alasa svar vāma adhara mādhurīm adharayan vācām vilāsaḥ mama
vidvāṃsaḥ ityādi prāya darśana abhiprāyam etat
tena sahṛdayaiḥ na manāk api vimanāyitavyam
bhāva dhvaniḥ ca ayam
uttara ardha pratipādya artha ālambanāyāḥ etad padya prayoga anubhāvāyāḥ kavi gata cintāyāḥ prādhānyena abhivyakteḥ
anupātta ubhaya nimittakaḥ vyatirekaḥ sphuṭaḥ laṃkāraḥ

original: vidrāṇaiva guṇajñatā samudito bhūyānasūyābharaḥ kālo 'yaṃ kalirājagāma jagatīlāvaṇyakukṣiṃbhariḥ /
analyzed: guṇa jña tā samuditaḥ bhūyān asūyā bharaḥ kālaḥ yam kaliḥ ājagāma jagatī lāvaṇya kukṣiṃbhariḥ

original: evaṃ bhāvanayā madīyakavite maunaṃ kimālambase jāgartu kṣitimaṇḍale ciramiha śrīkāmarūpeśvaraḥ // JPran_2 //
analyzed: evam bhāvanayā madīya kavite maunam kim ālambase jāgartu kṣiti maṇḍale ciram iha śrī kāmarūpa īśvaraḥ
kavi gata rāja viṣayaka rati bhāva dhvaniḥ ca ayam
itas ūrdhvam ayam eva ā carama padyam anuvartayiṣyate

original: asya cātra maunānubhāvito varṇanīyālambano nirvedo guṇa iti preyolaṃkārāspadam /
analyzed: asya ca atra mauna anubhāvitaḥ varṇanīya ālambanaḥ nirvedaḥ guṇaḥ iti preyaḥ ulaṃkāra āspadam
atra ca acetanāyām kavi tāyām cetana tva adhyavasāya mūla asaṃbandhe saṃbandha ātmikā atiśayoktiḥ vivakṣitā
tena bhāvanā mauna nirvedānām saṃbodhanasya ca nā anupapattiḥ
pāri indrāṇām ghurīṇaiḥ avani tala guhā garbhataḥ saṃpatadbhiḥ sva apabhraṃśa aparādha pracalita nayana prāntam ākarṇyamānaḥ
tvad prasthāna antar udyat pralaya jaladhara dhvāna dhikkāra dhīraḥ ghṛṣṭa kṣīra uda tīraḥ jagati vijayate dundubhi dvandva nādaḥ
atra rāja ālambanasya tādṛśa nāda śravaṇa uddīpitasya nayana pracalana anubhāvitasya giri guhā garbha utpatana abhivyaktena amarṣeṇa
saṃcāriṇā paripoṣitasya pāri indra gata utsāhasya sthāyinaḥ rāja viṣayaka rati bhāva aṅga tvāt rasālaṃkāra tvam
yat āhuḥ
pradhāne vākya arthe yatra aṅgam tu rasa ādayaḥ
kāvye tasmin alaṃkāraḥ rasa ādiḥ iti me matiḥ
iti
tṛtīya caturtha caraṇayoḥ tu sphuṭau eva vyatireka atiśayau
ghṛṣṭā śabdena tādṛśa nādaḥ velā acala pratibaddha tvāt agre na gataḥ
anyathā lokāloka acalam api spṛśet iti gamyate
eva mṛṣṭā iti na uktam
tathā sati śaithilya pratyaya āpatteḥ

original: kiṃ brūmastava vīratāṃ vayamamī yasmindharākhaṇḍala krīḍākuṇḍalitabhru śoṇanayanaṃ dormaṇḍalaṃ paśyati /
analyzed: kim brūmaḥ tava vīra tām vayam amī yasmin dharā khaṇḍala krīḍā kuṇḍalita bhru śoṇa nayanam dos maṇḍalam paśyati
māṇikya āvali kānti danturataraiḥ bhūṣā sahasra utkaraiḥ vindhya araṇya guhā gṛha avaniruhāḥ tad kālam ullāsitāḥ

original: atra vindhyāraṇyagatānāṃ guhāgṛhāṇāmavaniruhāṃ ca vindhyagatānāṃ guhāgṛhāṇāmaraṇyagatānāmavaniruhāṇāṃ
analyzed: atra vindhya araṇya gatānām guhāgṛhāṇām avaniruhām ca vindhya gatānām guhāgṛhāṇām araṇya gatānām avaniruhāṇām

original: vā bhūṣaṇena kāryeṇāprastutena tvadarinārīṇāṃ svanagarāṇi parityajya niśi guhāgṛheṣu
analyzed: vā bhūṣaṇena kāryeṇa aprastutena tvad ari nārīṇām sva nagarāṇi parityajya niśi guhā gṛheṣu

original: tarutaleṣu ca vinyasya sakalābharaṇāni kṛtaśayanānāṃ prātastvadāgamanasaṃbhrameṇa
analyzed: taru taleṣu ca vinyasya sakala ābharaṇāni kṛta śayanānām prātar tvad āgamana saṃbhrameṇa

original: tatkarmakaṃ vismaraṇaṃ bhāravaśātparityāgo vā prastuto gamyata ityaprastutapraśaṃsā /
analyzed: tad karmakam vismaraṇam bhāra vaśāt parityāgaḥ vā prastutaḥ gamyate iti aprastuta praśaṃsā
kāryasya yathā kathaṃcid prastuta tve tu paryāyoktam alaṃkāraḥ

original: māhātmyasya paro 'vadhirnijagṛhaṃ gambhīratāyāḥ pitā ratnānāmahameka eva bhuvane ko vāparo mādṛśaḥ /
analyzed: māhātmyasya paraḥ vadhiḥ nija gṛham gambhīra tāyāḥ pitā ratnānām aham ekaḥ eva bhuvane kaḥ vā aparaḥ mādṛśaḥ

original: ityevaṃ paricintya mā sma sahasā garvāndhakāraṃ gamo dugdhābdhe bhavatā samo vijayate śrīprāṇanārāyaṇaḥ // JPran_5 //
analyzed: iti evam paricintya mā sma sahasā garva andhakāram gamaḥ dugdha abdhe bhavatā samaḥ vijayate śrī prāṇanārāyaṇaḥ
atra upamānasya guṇa viśeṣa prayukta sādṛśya abhāva nibandhanam utkarṣam parihartum varṇyamāna sādṛśya ātmakaḥ pratīpa alaṃkāra bhedaḥ
sa ca upamā viśeṣaḥ iti eke
vicchitti vailakṣaṇyāt atiriktaḥ eva iti apare

original: tattvo janma sitāṃśuśekharatanujyotsnānimagnātmano dugdhāmbhonidhimugdhavīcivalayaiḥ sākaṃ parikrīḍanam /
analyzed: tattvaḥ janma sitāṃśu śekhara tanu jyotsnā nimagna ātmanaḥ dugdha ambhonidhi mugdha vīci valayaiḥ sākam parikrīḍanam

original: saṃvāsaḥ suralokasindhupuline vādaḥ sudhāṃśoḥ karaiḥ kasmānnojjvalimānamañcatutamāṃ deva tvadīyaṃ yaśaḥ // JPran_6 //
analyzed: saṃvāsaḥ sura loka sindhu puline vādaḥ sudhāṃśoḥ karaiḥ kasmāt nā ujjvalimānam añcatutamām deva tvadīyam yaśaḥ

original: atra yaśasi dhavalatātiśayastaddharmisaṃbandhaprayuktatvena kathita iti samasya viṣayaḥ /
analyzed: atra yaśasi dhavala tā atiśayaḥ tad dharmi saṃbandha prayukta tvena kathitaḥ iti samasya viṣayaḥ

original: aṃśukṛtaścandre tatkṛtaśca bhagavati bhagavatkṛtaśca rājanītyevamuttarottaramupacīyamāno rājagata utkarṣaḥ pratīyata iti sāraviṣayaḥ //
analyzed: aṃśu kṛtaḥ candre tad kṛtaḥ ca bhagavati bhagavat kṛtaḥ ca rājani iti evam uttarottaram upacīyamānaḥ rāja gataḥ utkarṣaḥ pratīyate iti sāra viṣayaḥ

original: ābadhnāsyalakānnirasyasitamāṃ colaṃ rasākāṅkṣayā laṅkāyāvaśatāṃ tanoṣi kuruṣe jaṅghālalāṭakṣatam /
analyzed: ābadhnāsi alakān colam rasa ākāṅkṣayā laṅkāyāḥ avaśa tām tanoṣi kuruṣe jaṅghā lalāṭa kṣatam

original: pratyaṅgaṃ parimardanirdayamaho cetaḥ samālambase vāmānāṃ viṣaye nṛpendra bhavataḥ prāgalbhyamadbhutam // JPran_7 //
analyzed: pratyaṅgam parimarda nirdayam aho cetaḥ samālambase vāmānām viṣaye nṛpa indra bhavataḥ prāgalbhyam adbhutam

original: atra prakṛtidharmigatayoḥ prakṛtāprakṛtayoḥ prakṛtayoreva vā vṛttāntayoḥ śleṣaḥ /
analyzed: atra prakṛti dharmi gatayoḥ prakṛta aprakṛtayoḥ prakṛtayoḥ eva vā vṛttāntayoḥ śleṣaḥ

original: sa ca ṣaṭsu sthaleṣu śabdanānātvanibandhano dvayoścārthanānātvanibandhanaḥ /
analyzed: sa ca ṣaṭsu sthaleṣu śabda nānātva nibandhanaḥ dvayoḥ ca artha nānātva nibandhanaḥ
dvau api etau śabda alaṃkārau iti prāñcaḥ
ādyaḥ jatu kāṣṭha nyāyena śabda śleṣaṇāt śabdālaṃkāraḥ
dvitīyaḥ tu eka vṛnta gata phala dvaya nyāyena artha śleṣaṇāt arthālaṃkāraḥ iti navyāḥ

original: deva tvāṃ paritaḥ stavantu kavayo lobhena kiṃ tāvatā stavyastvaṃ bhavitāsi yasya taruṇaścāpapratāpo 'niśam /
analyzed: deva tvām paritas stavantu kavayaḥ lobhena kim tāvatā stavyaḥ tvam bhavitāsi yasya taruṇaḥ cāpa pratāpaḥ niśam

original: kroḍāntaḥ kurutetarāṃ vasumatīmāśāḥ samāliṅgati dyāṃ cumbatyamarāvatī ca sahasā gacchatyagamyāmapi // JPran_8 //
analyzed: kroḍa antar kurutetarām vasumatīm āśāḥ samāliṅgati dyām cumbati amarāvatī ca sahasā gacchati agamyām api
atra pratāpa gataḥ pṛthivī ādi saṃbandhaḥ liṅga viśeṣa avacchinna tad tad sādhāraṇa viśeṣaṇa abhivyakta kāmuka vṛttānta abhinnatayā

original: sthita iti samāsoktiḥ kāryarūpadharmaprayuktaśuddhasādhāraṇyena viśeṣaṇasāmyamālambya pravṛttā /
analyzed: sthitaḥ iti samāsoktiḥ kārya rūpa dharma prayukta śuddha sādhāraṇyena viśeṣaṇa sāmyam ālambya pravṛttā
sā ca nindā utthāpaka tvāt ad vyāja stutau guṇaḥ

original: lokānāṃ vipadaṃ dhunoṣi kuruṣe saṃpattimatyutkaṭāmityalpetarajalpitairjaḍadhiyāṃ bhūpāla mā gā madam /
analyzed: lokānām vipadam dhunoṣi kuruṣe saṃpattimatī utkaṭām iti alpa itara jalpitaiḥ jaḍa dhiyām bhūpāla mā gāḥ madam

original: yatkīrtistava vallabhā laghutarabrahmāṇḍabhāṇḍodare piṇḍīkṛtya mahonnatāmapi tanuṃ kaṣṭena hā vartate // JPran_9 //
analyzed: yat kīrtiḥ tava vallabhā laghutara brahmāṇḍa bhāṇḍa udare piṇḍīkṛtya mahā unnatām api tanum kaṣṭena hā vartate
atra api prāgvat
param tu ādhāra ādheya anyatara vistṛta tva siddhi phalaka anyatara nyūna tva kalpanāt sādhika alaṃkāraḥ api tasyām guṇaḥ

original: kṣoṇīṃ śāsati mayyupadravalavaḥ kasyāpi na syāditi prauḍhaṃ vyāharato vacastava kathaṃ deva pratīmo vayam /
analyzed: kṣoṇīm śāsati mayi upadrava lavaḥ kasya api na syāt iti prauḍham vyāharataḥ vacaḥ tava katham deva pratīmaḥ vayam

original: pratyakṣaṃ bhavato vipakṣanivahairdyāmutpatadbhiḥ krudhā yadyuṣmatkulakoṭimūlapuruṣo nirbhidyate bhāskaraḥ // JPran_10 //
analyzed: pratyakṣam bhavataḥ vipakṣa nivahaiḥ dyām utpatadbhiḥ krudhā yat yuṣmad kula koṭi mūla puruṣaḥ nirbhidyate bhāskaraḥ
iha tu adhika samāsoktibhyām anāliṅgitā eva sā vyāja stutiḥ

original: āsvādena raso rasena kavitā kāvyena vaṇī tayā lokāntaḥkaraṇānurāgarasikaḥ sabhyaḥ sabhā cāmunā /
analyzed: āsvādena rasaḥ rasena kavi tā kāvyena vaṇī tayā loka antaḥkaraṇa anurāga rasikaḥ sabhyaḥ sabhā ca amunā

original: dāridryānaladahyamānajagatīpīyūṣadhārādhara kṣoṇīnātha tathā bhavāṃśca bhavatā bhūmaṇḍalaṃ bhāsate // JPran_11 //
analyzed: dāridrya anala dahyamāna jagatī pīyūṣa dhārādhara kṣoṇīnātha tathā bhavān ca bhavatā bhū maṇḍalam bhāsate
mālādīpakam etat iti prāñcaḥ

original: dīpakasya sādṛśyamūlakatāniyamānna mālādīpakamapi tvekāvalībheda iti tu vayam //
analyzed: dīpakasya sādṛśya mūlaka tā niyamāt na mālā dīpakam api tu eka āvalī bhedaḥ iti tu vayam

original: amlāyanyadarātikairavakulānyamlāsiṣuḥ satvaraṃ dainyadhvāntakadambakāni parito neśustamāṃ tāmasāḥ /
analyzed: amlāyan yat arāti kairava kulāni amlāsiṣuḥ sa tvaram dainya dhvānta kadambakāni paritas neśuḥ tamām tāmasāḥ

original: sanmārgāḥ prasaranti sādhunalinānyullāsamātanvate tanmanye bhavataḥ pratāpatapano deva prabhātonmukhaḥ // JPran_12 //
analyzed: sat mārgāḥ prasaranti sādhu nalināni ullāsam ātanvate tat manye bhavataḥ pratāpa tapanaḥ deva prabhāta unmukhaḥ
iha rūpaka niṣpādita liṅgakam anumānam nimitta virahāt utprekṣāyāḥ ayogāt vācakam anumiti param

original: utkṣiptāḥ kabarībharaṃ vivalitāḥ pārśvadvayaṃ nyakkṛtāḥ pādāmbhojayugaṃ ruṣā parihṛtā dūreṇa celāñcalam /
analyzed: utkṣiptāḥ kabarī bharam vivalitāḥ pārśva dvayam nyakkṛtāḥ pāda ambhoja yugam ruṣā parihṛtāḥ dūreṇa cela añcalam

original: gṛhṇanti tvarayā bhavatpratibhaṭakṣmāpālavāmabhruvāṃ yāntīnāṃ gahaneṣu kaṇṭakacitāḥ ke ke na bhūmīrūhāḥ // JPran_13 //
analyzed: gṛhṇanti tvarayā bhavat pratibhaṭa kṣmāpāla vāma bhruvām yāntīnām gahaneṣu kaṇṭaka citāḥ ke ke na bhūmīrūhāḥ

original: atra kaṇṭakacitatvena kabarīgrahaṇādeḥ saṃkīrṇatvātkāryadharmāntarā saṃkīrṇaśuddhasādhāraṇyena viśeṣaṇasāmyamālambya pravṛttā samāsoktiḥ //
analyzed: atra kaṇṭaka cita tvena kabarī grahaṇa ādeḥ saṃkīrṇa tvāt kārya dharma antarā saṃkīrṇa śuddha sādhāraṇyena viśeṣaṇa sāmyam ālambya pravṛttā samāsoktiḥ

original: dṛṣṭiḥ saṃbhṛtamaṅgalā budhamayī deva tvadīyā sabhā kāvyasyāśrayabhūtamāsyamaruṇādhāro 'dharaḥ sundaraḥ /
analyzed: dṛṣṭiḥ saṃbhṛta maṅgalā budha mayī deva tvadīyā sabhā kāvyasya āśraya bhūtam āsyam aruṇa ādhāraḥ dharaḥ sundaraḥ

original: krodhaste 'śanimūrudāradhiṣaṇa svāntaṃ tu somāspadaṃ rājannūnamanūnavikrama bhavānsarvagrahālambanam // JPran_14 //
analyzed: krodhaḥ te śani mūru dāra dhiṣaṇa svāntam tu soma āspadam rājan ūnam anūna vikrama bhavān sarva graha ālambanam
atra utprekṣyamāna sarva graha ālambana tvasya samāna adhikaraṇeṣu dharmeṣu tad tad graha āśrita aṅgaka tveṣu

original: viśeṣaṇībhūtaistattadgrahaiḥ saha viṣayasya rājño kalyāṇāśrayatvādiṣu viśeṣaṇānāṃ
analyzed: viśeṣaṇībhūtaiḥ tad tad grahaiḥ saha viṣayasya rājñaḥ kalyāṇa āśraya tva ādiṣu viśeṣaṇānām
kalyāṇa ādīnām śleṣeṇa abheda saṃpādana dvārā tādṛśa dharma sādhāraṇa tā saṃpattau tad nimittaka utprekṣā siddhiḥ

original: sṛṣṭiḥ sṛṣṭibhuvā purā kila paritrātuṃ jaganmaṇḍalaṃ tvaṃ caṇḍātapanirdayaṃ tapasi yajjvālājaṭālaiḥ karaiḥ /
analyzed: sṛṣṭiḥ sṛṣṭibhuvā purā kila paritrātum jagat maṇḍalam tvam caṇḍa ātapa nirdayam tapasi yat jvālā jaṭālaiḥ karaiḥ

original: saṃrambhāruṇalocano raṇabhuvi prasthātukāmo 'dhunā jānīmo bhavatā na hanta viditaḥ śrīkāmarūpeśvaraḥ // JPran_15 //
analyzed: saṃrambha aruṇa locanaḥ raṇa bhuvi prasthātu kāmaḥ dhunā jānīmaḥ bhavatā na hanta viditaḥ śrī kāmarūpa īśvaraḥ

original: atra rājavarṇanāṅgatvena raverbhayotpādane varṇyatvena prastute sākṣāttadananuguṇatvenāprastutena prasthānena sākṣāttadanuguṇaṃ ripukartṛkaṃ  #
analyzed: atra rāja varṇanā aṅgatvena raveḥ bhaya utpādane varṇya tvena prastute sākṣāt tad ananuguṇa tvena aprastutena prasthānena sākṣāt tad anuguṇam ripu kartṛkam
sūrya maṇḍala bhedanam kāryam gamyate

original: āyātā kamalāsanasya bhavanāddraṣṭuṃ trilokītalaṃ gīrvāṇeṣu dināni kānicidaho nītvā punaḥ kautukāt /
analyzed: āyātā kamalāsanasya bhavanāt draṣṭum trilokī talam gīrvāṇeṣu dināni kānicid ahar nītvā punar kautukāt

original: bhrāntvā bhūvalaye mahākavikulopāsyā tavāsyāmbuje rājansaṃprati satyadhāmani girāṃ devī sukhaṃ vartate // JPran_16 //
analyzed: bhrāntvā bhū valaye mahā kavi kula upāsyā tava asya ambuje rājan saṃprati satya dhāmani girām devī sukham vartate
atra ekasya ādheyasya aneka ādhāra saṃbandhāt paryāyaḥ
tatra prathama caraṇa gatam adhikaraṇam ārtha viśleṣa avadhika pañcamyā viśleṣasya upaśleṣa apekṣa tvena aupaśleṣika adhikaraṇasya ākṣepa gamya tvāt
satya dhāmani iti śleṣa bhittikā bheda adhyavasānena mukhasya satya loka tā siddhau sukha vartana siddhiḥ
vidvat dainyatamaḥ trimūrtiḥ athavā vairi indra vaṃśa aṭavī dāva agniḥ kim aho mahā ujjvala yaśaḥ śītāṃśu dugdha ambudhiḥ

original: kiṃ vānaṅgabhujaṃgadaṣṭavanitājīvāturevaṃ nṛṇāṃ keṣāmeṣa narādhipo na janayatyalpetarāḥ kalpanāḥ // JPran_17 //
analyzed: kim vā anaṅga bhujaṃga daṣṭa vanitā jīva ātuḥ evam nṛṇām keṣām eṣa narādhipaḥ na janayati alpa itarāḥ kalpanāḥ
atra koṭīnām āropa antara mūlaka tvāt paramparita saṃśayaḥ sa ca āhāryaḥ
mūla āropasya tathā tvāt
kavau iva kavi nibaddha pramātṛ antare pi āhārya buddheḥ avirodhāt

original: nadanti madadantinaḥ parilasanti vājivrajāḥ paṭhanti birudāvalīmahitamandire bandinaḥ /
analyzed: nadanti mada dantinaḥ parilasanti vāji vrajāḥ paṭhanti biruda āvalī mahita mandire bandinaḥ

original: idaṃ tadavadhi prabho yadavadhi pravṛddhā na te yugāntadahanopamā nayanakoṇaśoṇadyutiḥ // JPran_18 //
analyzed: idam tat avadhi prabho yad avadhi pravṛddhā na te yugānta dahana upamā nayana koṇa śoṇa dyutiḥ

original: atra mukhyārthasya rājaviṣayāyāḥ kaviraterupakārakasya yadaiva tava kopodayastadaiva
analyzed: atra mukhya arthasya rāja viṣayāyāḥ kavi rateḥ upakārakasya yadā eva tava kopa udayaḥ tadā eva

original: tava ripūṇāṃ saṃpado bhasmasādbhaviṣyantīti vastuna upakārikā nayanakoṇaśoṇadyuteryugāntadahanopamā //
analyzed: tava ripūṇām saṃpadaḥ bhasmasāt bhaviṣyanti iti vastunaḥ upakārikā nayana koṇa śoṇa dyuteḥ yugānta dahana upamā

original: mayi tvadupamāvidhau vasumatīśa vācaṃyame na varṇayati māmayaṃ kaviriti krudhaṃ mā kṛthāḥ /
analyzed: mayi tvad upamā vidhau vasumatī īśa vācaṃyame na varṇayati mām ayam kaviḥ iti krudham mā kṛthāḥ

original: carācaramidaṃ jagajjanayato vidhermānase padaṃ na vidadhetarāṃ tava samo dvitīyo naraḥ // JPran_19 //
analyzed: carācaram idam jagat janayataḥ vidheḥ mānase padam na vidadhetarām tava samaḥ dvitīyaḥ naraḥ

original: atra tvatsamo 'nyo nāstīti pratyayādupamānaluptopamā vyaṅgyeti prāñcaḥ /
analyzed: atra tvad samaḥ nyaḥ na asti iti pratyayāt upamāna lupta upamā vyaṅgyā iti prāñcaḥ
sarvathā eva sāmyasya apratiṣṭhānāt na iyam upamā
anyathā vyatirekasya api tattva āpatteḥ
marisasi kaṃṭaka kaliāim
mālai kusuma sariccham bhamara bhamantaḥ na pāvesi

original: '; ityatra tu na prāpsyasītyuktvā kvacittvadagocare sthale bhaviṣyatīti pratīteḥ sādṛśyapratiṣṭhānālluptopamāstu /
analyzed: iti atra tu na prāpsyasi iti uktvā kvacid tvad agocare sthale bhaviṣyati iti pratīteḥ sādṛśya pratiṣṭhānāt luptopamā astu
tasmāt asama alaṃkāraḥ eva ayam iti tu navyāḥ
bhuja bhramita paṭṭiśa uddalita dṛpta dantāvalam bhavantam ari maṇḍala krathana paśyataḥ saṃgare

original: karālakuliśāhatisphuṭavibhinnavindhyācalo na kasya hṛdayaṃ jhaṭityadhiruroha jambhāhitaḥ // JPran_20 //
analyzed: karāla kuliśa āhati sphuṭa vibhinna vindhya acalaḥ na kasya hṛdayam jhaṭiti adhiruroha jambha āhitaḥ
atra smaraṇa alaṃkāraḥ paraṃtu lakṣyaḥ

original: yamaḥ pratimahībhṛtāṃ hutavaho 'si tannīvṛtāṃ satāṃ khalu yudhiṣṭhiro dhanapatirdhanākāṅkṣiṇām /
analyzed: yamaḥ prati mahībhṛtām hutavahaḥ si tat nīvṛtām satām khalu yudhiṣṭhiraḥ dhanapatiḥ dhana ākāṅkṣiṇām

original: gṛhaṃ śaraṇamicchatāṃ kuliśakoṭibhirnirmitaṃ tvameka iha bhūtale bahuvidho vidhātrā kṛtaḥ // JPran_21 //
analyzed: gṛham śaraṇam icchatām kuliśa koṭibhiḥ nirmitam tvam ekaḥ iha bhū tale bahuvidhaḥ vidhātrā kṛtaḥ

original: atra kavinā yamatvādinā rūpeṇa rājño rūpavataḥ karaṇādrūpakeṇa vipakṣabhūpālādīnāmetasminnāgate
analyzed: atra kavinā yama tva ādinā rūpeṇa rājñaḥ rūpavataḥ karaṇāt rūpakeṇa vipakṣa bhūpāla ādīnām etasmin āgate
yama tva ādinā bhrānteḥ api saṃbhavāt bhrāntimatā taiḥ eva anekaiḥ grahītṛbhiḥ anekaiḥ dharmaiḥ ullekhanāt ullekha viśeṣeṇa
ca saha ullekhaḥ

original: dvinetra iva vāsavo mitakaro vivasvāniva dvitīya iva candramāḥ śritavapurmanobhūriva /
analyzed: dvi netraḥ iva vāsavaḥ mita karaḥ vivasvān iva dvitīyaḥ iva candramāḥ śrita vapuḥ manobhūḥ iva

original: narākṛtirivāmbudhirgururiva kṣamāmāgato nuto nikhilabhūsurairjayati kāmarūpeśvaraḥ // JPran_22 //
analyzed: nara ākṛtiḥ iva ambudhiḥ guruḥ iva kṣamām āgataḥ nutaḥ nikhila bhūsuraiḥ jayati kāmarūpa īśvaraḥ

original: atra rājagatānāṃ dvinetratvādīnāṃ vāsavāditādātmyavirodhināṃ virodhanivartanāya viṣayiṣu vāsavādiṣvāropeṇa sādhāraṇīkaraṇāttannimittakotprekṣā
analyzed: atra rāja gatānām dvinetra tva ādīnām vāsava ādi tādātmya virodhinām virodha nivartanāya viṣayiṣu vāsava ādiṣu āropeṇa sādhāraṇīkaraṇāt tad nimittakā utprekṣā
sā ca iha mālā rūpā
na ca atra upamā śakya rūpaṇā
dvi netra tva ādi ukteḥ niṣprayojanaka tva āpatteḥ

original: na copamāniṣpādakaṃ teṣāṃ sādhāraṇyaṃ tadabhāve 'pi paramaiśvaryādibhiḥ pratīyamānaistasyā niṣpatteḥ /
analyzed: na ca upamā niṣpādakam teṣām sādhāraṇyam tad abhāve pi parama aiśvarya ādibhiḥ pratīyamānaiḥ tasyāḥ niṣpatteḥ
asundara tvena upamā niṣpādaka tayā kaveḥ anabhipreta tvāt ca

original: evaṃ dvitīyādīnāṃ candrādiṣvāropo 'pyupamāyāṃ satyāmanarthaka eva syāt //
analyzed: evam dvitīya ādīnām candra ādiṣu āropaḥ u pi upamāyām satyām anarthakaḥ eva syāt

original: dīnavrāte dayārdrā nikhilaripukule nirdayā kiṃ ca mṛdvī kāvyālāpeṣu tarkaprativacanavidhau karkaśatvaṃ dadhānā /
analyzed: dīna vrāte dayā ārdrā nikhila ripu kule nirdayā kim ca mṛdvī kāvya ālāpeṣu tarka prativacana vidhau karkaśa tvam dadhānā

original: lubdhā dharmeṣvalubdhā vasuni paravipaddarśane kāṃdiśīkā rājannājanmaramya sphurati bahuvidhā tāvakī cittavṛttiḥ // JPran_23 //
analyzed: lubdhā dharmeṣu alubdhā vasuni para vipad darśane kāṃdiśīkā rājan ā janma ramya sphurati bahuvidhā tāvakī citta vṛttiḥ
atra viṣaya aneka tva prayukta cittavṛtteḥ anekavidha tvam iti ullekhaḥ
tatra ca tadīya cittavṛtti tvena ekatva adhyavasānam tantram

original: devāḥ ke pūrvadevāḥ samiti mama naraḥ santi ke vā purastādeva jalpanti tāvatpratibhaṭapṛtanāvartinaḥ kṣatravīrāḥ /
analyzed: devāḥ ke pūrvadevāḥ samiti mama naraḥ santi ke vā purastāt eva jalpanti tāvat pratibhaṭa pṛtanā vartinaḥ kṣatra vīrāḥ
yāvat na āyāti rājan nayana viṣaya tām antaka trāsi mūrteḥ mugdha ari prāṇa dugdha aśana masṛṇa ruciḥ tvad kṛpāṇaḥ bhujaṃgaḥ
atra śuddha paramparita rūpakam
prācī saṃdhyā samudyat mahima dinamaṇeḥ māna māṇikya kāntiḥ jvālā mālā karālā kavalita jagataḥ krodha kāla analasya

original: āśākāntāpadāmbhoruhatalavigalanmañjulākṣārasābhā sā bhāti kṣoṇiśobhākaraṇa tava dṛśoḥ saṃgare śoṇimaśrīḥ // JPran_25 //
analyzed: āśā kāntā pada ambhoruha tala vigalat mañjula akṣā rasa ābhā sā bhāti kṣoṇi śobhā karaṇa tava dṛśoḥ saṃgare śoṇima śrīḥ
atrā api tat eva paraṃtu mālā ātmakam
tvām sundarī nivaha niṣṭhura dhairya garva nirvāsana eka rasikam samare nirīkṣya

original: kā vā ripukṣitibhṛtāṃ bata rājalakṣmīḥ svāmivratatvamapariskhalitaṃ babhāra // JPran_26 //
analyzed: kā vā ripu kṣitibhṛtām bata rāja lakṣmīḥ svāmi vrata tvam apariskhalitam babhāra

original: atra śatrūṇāṃ rājyalakṣmīstvāṃ prāpteti vivakṣito 'rthaḥ pātivratyaskhalitarūpeṇābhihita iti paryāyoktam /
analyzed: atra śatrūṇām rājya lakṣmīḥ tvām prāptā iti vivakṣitaḥ rthaḥ pātivratya skhalita rūpeṇa abhihitaḥ iti paryāya uktam

original: tacca rājyalakṣmyā nāyikātvasiddhyarthaṃ samāsoktimapekṣata iti sā tatra guṇaḥ //
analyzed: tat ca rājya lakṣmyāḥ nāyikā tva siddhi artham samāsoktim apekṣate iti sā tatra guṇaḥ

original: nāsatyayogo vacaneṣu kīrtau tathārjunaḥ karmaṇi cāpi dharmaḥ /
analyzed: na asatya yogaḥ vacaneṣu kīrtau tathā arjunaḥ karmaṇi ca api dharmaḥ

original: citte jagatprāṇabhavo yadāste vaśaṃvadāste kimu pānḍuputrāḥ // JPran_27 //
analyzed: citte jagat prāṇa bhavaḥ yadā āste vaśaṃvadāḥ te kimu pānḍu putrāḥ

original: atra pāṇḍuputreṣu viṣayeṣu rājavaśaṃvadatādātmyotprekṣāyāṃ rājāśritatvarūpo viṣayidharmaḥ
analyzed: atra pāṇḍu putreṣu viṣayeṣu rāja vaśaṃvada tādātmya utprekṣāyām rāja āśrita tva rūpaḥ viṣayi dharmaḥ
śleṣeṇa viṣayāṇām tad āśritānām ca asatya abhāva śukla guna puṇya parameśvarāṇām abheda saṃpādana dvārā
viṣaya sādhāraṇīkṛtaḥ
mantha acala bhramaṇa vegha vaśaṃvadāḥ ye dugdha ambudheḥ udapatan aṇavaḥ sudhāyāḥ

original: tairekatāmupagatairvividhauṣadhībhirdhātā sasarja tava deva dayādṛgantān // JPran_28 //
analyzed: taiḥ eka tām upagataiḥ vividha auṣadhībhiḥ dhātā sasarja tava deva dayā dṛś antān

original: atra dṛganteṣu na kevalaṃ saṃjīvakatvādayo 'mṛtamātraguṇa eva kaverbubodhayiṣitā api tu nikhilajanavaśīkāratvādayo 'nye 'pīti sudhākaṇeṣvoṣadhīsaṃsargo  #
analyzed: atra dṛś anteṣu na kevalam saṃjīvaka tva ādayaḥ mṛta mātra guṇaḥ eva kaveḥ bubodhayiṣitāḥ api tu nikhila jana vaśīkāra tva ādayaḥ nye pi iti sudhā kaṇeṣu oṣadhī saṃsargaḥ
tiśaya artham upāttaḥ
keśaiḥ vadhūnām atha sarva koṣaiḥ prāṇaiḥ ca sākam pratibhū patīnām

original: tvayā raṇe niṣkaruṇena gāḍhaṃ cāpasya jīvā cakṛṣe javena // JPran_29 //
analyzed: tvayā raṇe niṣkaruṇena gāḍham cāpasya jīvā cakṛṣe javena
atra ca apakarṣaṇa kāryāṇānām keśa ākarṣaṇa ādīnām paurvāparya viparyaya ātmanā atiśayena anuprāṇitā sahoktiḥ

original: mahendratulyaṃ kavayo bhavantaṃ vadantu kiṃ tāniha vārayāmaḥ /
analyzed: mahendra tulyam kavayaḥ bhavantam vadantu kim tān iha vārayāmaḥ
bhavān sahasraiḥ samupāsyamānaḥ katham samānaḥ tridaśādhipena
atra śleṣa utthāpita tridaśa tva saṃkhyām ādāya vyatirekaḥ upātta ubhaya nimittakaḥ

original: sa tu varṣatu vāri vāridastvamudārāśaya ratnavarṣaṇaḥ /
analyzed: sa tu varṣatu vāri vāridaḥ tvam udāra āśaya ratna varṣaṇaḥ
sa kuhū rajanī malīmasaḥ tvam iha antar bahis eva nirmalaḥ

original: atrāpi sa eva paraṃ tu śleṣo 'trānutthāpako niṣidhyamānaṃ sāmyaṃ ca na śābdamiti viśeṣaḥ //
analyzed: atrā api saḥ eva param tu śleṣaḥ niṣidhyamānam sāmyam ca na śābdam iti viśeṣaḥ
katipayaiḥ niraṇāyi janādhipaḥ tad aparaiḥ udaṭaṅki dhanādhipaḥ

original: ajani kevalameṣa girāṃ patirbhuvi madekamate kamateśvaraḥ // JPran_32 //
analyzed: ajani kevalam eṣa girām patiḥ bhuvi mad eka mate kamata īśvaraḥ

original: atra nāyaṃ rājā kiṃ tu girāṃ patirityākārāpahnutiḥ /
analyzed: atra na ayam rājā kim tu girām patiḥ iti ākāra apahnutiḥ
tatra niṣedha bhāgaḥ parama tattva uktyā pūrva ardhena gamyate
āropa aṃśaḥ tu uttara ardhena
makara pratimaiḥ mahā bhaṭaiḥ kavibhiḥ ratna nibhaiḥ samanvitaḥ
kavi tā amṛta kīrti candrayoḥ tvam iha urvī ramaṇā asi bhājanam

original: atra rājño jaladhyupamāyāḥ śabdenābhidhāne 'pyaṅgopamābhirākṣepādekadeśavivartinyupamā tenottarārdha upamitasamāsa eva /
analyzed: atra rājñaḥ jaladhi upamāyāḥ śabdena abhidhāne pi aṅga upamābhiḥ ākṣepāt eka deśa vivartinī upamā tena uttara ardhaḥ upamita samāsaḥ eva
viśeṣaṇa samāsa vedyasya tādātmyasya prakṛte n upayogāt
puras purastāt ari bhūpatīnām bhavanti bhūvallabha bhasma śeṣāḥ
anantaram te bhrukuṭī viṭaṅkāt patanti roṣa anala visphuliṅgāḥ
atra prayojaka atiśaya kṛtaḥ prayojya śaighrya atiśayaḥ gamyaḥ
kārya kāraṇa paurvāparya viparyaya rūpā ca iyam atiśayoktiḥ
bhuvana tritaye mānavaiḥ paripūrṇe vibudhaiḥ ca dānavaiḥ

original: na bhaviṣyati nāsti nābhavannṛpa yaste bhajate tulāspadam // JPran_35 //
analyzed: na bhaviṣyati nā asti nā abhavat nṛpa yaḥ te bhajate tulā āspadam
atra upamāna lupta upamā iti prāñcaḥ
asama ākhyam alaṃkāra antaram iti tu vayam
pīyūṣa yūṣa kalpām alpām api te giram nipītavatām
toṣāya kalpate naḥ yoṣādhara bimba madhurima udrekaḥ
atra saṃbandhe pi asaṃbandhaḥ iti atiśayokti bhedaḥ

original: upameyopamānaviśeṣaṇābhyāmalpatvodriktatvābhyāmalpayāpi saha bhūyānapi madhurimā sāmyaṃ kartuṃ yatrānīśastatra kiṃ vācyaṃ bhūyasyeti vailakṣaṇyātmā  #
analyzed: upameya upamāna viśeṣaṇābhyām alpatva udrikta tvābhyām alpayā api saha bhūyān api madhurimā sāmyam kartum yatra anīśaḥ tatra kim vācyam bhūyasya iti vailakṣaṇya ātmā
vyatirekaḥ ca
bhāsayati vyoma sthā jagat akhilam kumudinīḥ vikāsayati
kīrtiḥ tava dharaṇi gatā sagara sutāya asama phala tām nayate
atra vyajamāna candrikā rūpaka saṃkīrṇaḥ ullekha dhvaniḥ
bhāgyena saha ripūṇām uttiṣṭhasi viṣṭarāt kṛdhā āviṣṭaḥ

original: sahasaiva patasi teṣu kṣitiśāsana mṛtyunā sākam // JPran_38 //
analyzed: sahasā eva patasi teṣu kṣitiśāsana mṛtyunā sākam
keśaiḥ vadhūnām
iti atra karmaṇaḥ sahoktiḥ
iha tu kartuḥ iti viśeṣaḥ
tvayi pākaśāsana same śāsati sakalam vasuṃdharā valayam

original: vipine vairivadhūnāṃ varṣanti vilocanāni ca dināni // JPran_39 //
analyzed: vipine vairi vadhūnām varṣanti vilocanāni ca dināni
atra varṣa vat ācaranti iti ācāra kvip antena śleṣāt śleṣa mūlikā tulya yogitā
ripu kāminī varṇana viṣaya tvena upamāna upameyayoḥ dvayoḥ api prakṛta tvāt
ahita apakaraṇa bheṣaja naranātha bhavān kara sthitaḥ yasya

original: tasya kuto 'hibhayaṃ syādakhilāmapi medinīṃ carataḥ // JPran_40 //
analyzed: tasya kutas hi bhayam syāt akhilām api medinīm carataḥ
atra śleṣa niveditasya sarpa bhaya abhāvasya upapādaka tayā upāttasya rājani bheṣaja tādātmya āropasya api upapādaka tayā
sthitam rāja saṃbandhini dviṣat apakaraṇa rūpe dharme śleṣa nivedita sarpata apakaraṇa tādātmyam iti

original: prathamacaraṇe śliṣṭaparamparitarūpakaṃ tṛtīye tu śleṣa eva /
analyzed: prathama caraṇe śliṣṭa paramparita rūpakam tṛtīye tu śleṣaḥ eva

original: kuvalayalakṣmīṃ harate tava kīrtistatra kiṃ citram /
analyzed: kuvalaya lakṣmīm harate tava kīrtiḥ tatra kim citram
yasmāt nidānam asyāḥ loka namasya aṅghri paṅkajaḥ hi bhavān
atra utpādaka samāna guṇa tvāt utpādyasya utpādaka saṃsarga anurūpaḥ sama alaṃkāra viśeṣaḥ
śleṣaḥ ca asmin guṇaḥ
dṛṣṭaḥ sadasi ced ugrāḥ candra candana candrikāḥ

original: atha tvaṃ saṃgare saumyāḥ śeṣakālānalāsayaḥ // JPran_42 //
analyzed: atha tvam saṃgare saumyāḥ śeṣa kāla anala asayaḥ
atra dṛṣṭaḥ sadasi iti vākye tvam iti asya apakarṣaṇāt

original: atha tvaṃ saṃgara ityatra ca tvamityasyānuvartanādvākyayoḥ padavinimayātmālaṃkāraḥ pūrvārdhe /
analyzed: atha tvam saṃgare iti atra ca tvam iti asya anuvartanāt vākyayoḥ pada vinimaya ātma alaṃkāraḥ pūrva ardhe
uttara ardhe prakṛta aneka dharma saṃbandhāt tulya yogi tā
upameyasya utkṛṣṭa guṇa tva siddhaye upamānasya tad viruddha guṇa kalpanā ātmakena alaṃkāra antareṇa śabali tā
apāre khalu saṃsāre vidhinā ekaḥ rjunaḥ kṛtaḥ

original: kīrtyā nirmalayā bhūpa tvayā sarve 'rjunāḥ kṛtāḥ // JPran_43 //
analyzed: kīrtyā nirmalayā bhūpa tvayā sarve rjunāḥ kṛtāḥ
iha śleṣa mūlaḥ vyatirekaḥ
dadhīci bali karṇeṣu hima hema acala abdhiṣu

original: adātṛtvamadhairyaṃ ca dṛṣṭe bhavati bhāsate // JPran_44 //
analyzed: a dātṛ tvam adhairyam ca dṛṣṭe bhavati bhāsate
atrā api sā eva tathāvidhā
yathā saṃkhya saṃkaraḥ tu viśeṣaḥ
śāsati tvayi he rājan akhaṇḍa avani maṇḍalam

original: na manāgapi niścinte maṇḍale śatrumittrayoḥ // JPran_45 //
analyzed: na manāk api niścinte maṇḍale śatru mittrayoḥ
iha api tulya yogitā mittra śabda śleṣa utthāpitā vyāja stutiḥ ca
bhānuḥ agniḥ yamaḥ vā ayam baliḥ śibiḥ
pratyarthinaḥ rthinaḥ ca ittham tvayi yānti vikalpanām
iha tu saṃśayaḥ ullekha āliṅgitaḥ
bhavān kuvalayasya induḥ ānandayati mānavān
iha śliṣṭa paramparitam rūpakam mālā rūpam
gagane candrikāyante himāyante himācale

original: pṛthivyāṃ sāgarāyante bhūpāla tava kīrtayaḥ // JPran_48 //
analyzed: pṛthivyām sāgarāyante bhūpāla tava kīrtayaḥ
iha mālā upamā āliṅgitaḥ ullekhaḥ
mṛga tām harayan madhye vṛkṣa tām ca
nakṣatra tām mahīpānām tvam indo asi bhūpate
iha śuddha paramparitā mālā rūpa upamā
ācāra kvip antāt śatari rūpāṇi
tiṅi ca ekam indu vasi
madhye sudhā samdurasya sitā maya gṛha udare
pūrṇa indu viṣṭare deva sthātum yogyāḥ tava uktayaḥ

original: atra trayāṇāṃ sudhāsamudrādīnāṃ viśeṣaṇaviśeṣyabhāvena madhurimaṇi parāṃ kāṣṭhāmadhirūḍhe
analyzed: atra trayāṇām sudhā samudra ādīnām viśeṣaṇa viśeṣya bhāvena madhurimaṇi parām kāṣṭhām adhirūḍhe

original: tvadīyoktipadasaṃbandho yukto na tu viśakalita ityatiśāyakāsadviśeṣaṇanibandhanaḥ prauḍhoktiḥ //
analyzed: tvadīya ukti pada saṃbandhaḥ yuktaḥ na tu viśakalitaḥ iti atiśāyaka asat viśeṣaṇa nibandhanaḥ prauḍhā uktiḥ
nirmaryāda prasāda mahā ambudheḥ

original: ubhayavadayaṃ deva tvattaḥ kathaṃ paramolbaṇaḥ pralayadahanajvālājālākulo mahasāṃ gaṇaḥ // JPran_51 //
analyzed: ubhaya vat ayam deva tvattaḥ katham parama ulbaṇaḥ pralaya dahana jvālā jāla ākulaḥ mahasām gaṇaḥ
atra kāraṇa guṇa viruddha sva guṇasya kāryasya utpatteḥ viṣama alaṃkāraḥ
amṛta lahari ādīnām trayāṇām adharīkaraṇa ātmanā vyatirekeṇa saṃjīvaka tva parama śītala tva viśuddha tva saundaryāṇām atiśayaḥ gamyate
evam eṣu padyeṣu pi anye laṃkārāḥ sphuṭa tvāt na vivecitāḥ
sahṛdayānām prīti āvaśyakam kiṃcid vyākhyātam anyat tu taiḥ evā ullāsanīyam iti alam pallavitena
tailaṅga anvaya maṅgala ālaya mahā lakṣmī dayā lalitaḥ śrīmat perama bhaṭṭa sūnuḥ aniśam vidvas lalāṭaṃtapaḥ

original: saṃtuṣṭaḥ kamatādhipasya kavitāmākarṇya tadvarṇanaṃ śrīmatpaṇḍitarājapaṇḍitajagannātho vyadhāsīdidam // JPran_52 //
analyzed: saṃtuṣṭaḥ kamatā adhipasya kavi tām ākarṇya tad varṇanam śrīmat paṇḍita rāja paṇḍita jagannāthaḥ vyadhāsīt idam
dordaṇḍa dvaya kuṇḍalīkṛta lasat kodaṇḍa a caṇḍa āśuga dhvasta uddaṇḍa vipakṣa maṇḍalam iha tvām vīkṣya madhya īraṇam
valgat gāṇḍiva mukta kāṇḍa valaya jvālā āvalī tāṇḍava bhraśyat khāṇḍava ruṣṭa pāṇḍavam aho kaḥ na kṣitīśaḥ smaret
atra smaraṇa alaṃkāraḥ
bhāvaḥ iti tu na bhrāmitavyam
sādṛśya mūlaka tva a tad mūlaka tvābhyām bhāva tva alaṃkāra tvayoḥ iha vyavasthiteḥ śabda vedya tvāt ca

original: iti paṇḍitarājaśrījagannāthaviracitaṃ prāṇābharaṇaṃ tatkṛtayaiva ṭippaṇyā sametaṃ samāptam /
analyzed: iti paṇḍita rāja śrī jagannātha viracitam prāṇa ābharaṇam tad kṛtayā eva ṭippaṇyā sametam samāptam
